methods: abstract PendingResult<Status> addListener(GoogleApiClient client, MessageApi.MessageListener listener) Registers a listener to receive MessageEvents.
abstract PendingResult<Status> removeListener(GoogleApiClient client, MessageApi.MessageListener listener) Removes a message listener.
abstract PendingResult<MessageApi.SendMessageResult> sendMessage(GoogleApiClient client, String nodeId, String path, byte[] data) Sends byte[] data to the specified node.
